channel.title: backups on Scott O'Brien
channel.description: Recent content in backups on Scott O'Brien

item.title: Backup your site!
item.description: In my previous post I mentioned how I didn’t back up or migrate any of my data before we stopped paying the hosting company, so it’s all lost. This has me thinking how much of a shame it would be if I build a wealth of information or a blog that I can use to identify myself and my work, only to have it go if the machine it’s hosted on dies.
